title: Linear Search: Find Index
description: Implement a function `linearSearch(arr, target)` that returns the index of the first occurrence of `target` in `arr`, or -1 if not found.

easy: Pseudo-code: for i in [0..n): if arr[i] === target return i; return -1;
Edge cases: empty array should return -1.
hard: Return -1 after the loop if nothing matched
